short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a text and send it to ChatGPT or Gemini to translate or explain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sends the selected text to OpenAI's ChatGPT or Google's Gemini with a prefixed message of your preference.

You can use it to translate a text, explain the meaning of the selected text or even reword it.

Operation Mode:
1. Window Mode: The new instance of the chatbot is opened in a popup window
2. Tab Mode: The new instance of the chatbot is opened next to the current tab

Use the right-click context menu over the action button to change the mode.

Hints:
1. You can press the action button to open ChatGPT or gemini next to the current tab.

--Legal
This extension only opens the official chatbot and sends the selected text to it to increase your productivity. It has nothing to do with the companies
